thread.title: Was Jay Z Crying After Beyoncé's Performance? - Jay Z Reacts to Beyoncé's Performance
thread.title_full: Was Jay Z Crying After Beyoncé's Performance? - Jay Z Reacts to Beyoncé's Grammy Performance

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Was Jay Z Crying After Beyoncé's Performance? - Jay Z Reacts to Beyoncé's Performance
text:
Beyoncé slayed her Grammys performance —while pregnant with twins, mind you—and Jay Z couldn't help but look on like the proud (and lucky) husband that he is. If Bey's set left you in tears, Jay Z might be right there with you. When her performance ended, fans swore they saw the rapper shedding a few tears.
jay z crying lord jesus i understand same
— Quiniva (@QuinivaSC) February 13, 2017
JAY Z CRYING I'M CRYING MY DOGS CRYING EVERYBODY CRYING
— riona (@khapeach) February 13, 2017
